title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the height of the label does not change immediately.
OB: Currently, when modifying the font size of a label, the height of the label does not adjust accordingly.
EB: The height of the label should adjust automatically when the font size is modified.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:1. Add a label to the interface.
2. Modify the font size of the label to be '18 points'.
